channel.title: My first model in RuneScape, please rate :) - Noob sword
channel.description:
Hi,
It has been loooooong ago when I last coded a server... i can still do it but I'm too lazy So I was like "Hmm... I want to make my own models in RuneScape" So I did... took me 3 days to get this working (modelling only took 15-30 mins I guess; most time wasted on finding right server and client...). I called my model noob sword, as it's actually a sword and it's my noob model ;)
3DS Max 2009: [img]http://miw.bplaced.net/images/noobsword3ds.png[/img]
Metasequoia: [img]http://miw.bplaced.net/images/noobswordmsq.png[/img]
WireFrame: [img]http://miw.bplaced.net/images/noobswordwire.png[/img]
RuneScape: [img]http://miw.bplaced.net/images/noobswordrs.png[/img]
Please comment on it :D
PS: I am Man Ik Weet... started here long ago and too lazy to make new account (owned NederScape...)

@r.v.d.p wrote:

yes, I used a box for the blade and a box for a part of the handle, also a cilinder for the handle

item.title: My first model in RuneScape, please rate :) - Noob sword
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

Thanks for the reply, yeah it looks like a dildo because I used some smoothing… but as I said, this model took me 30 mins max, for my first sword attempt

Ja ik ben Nederlander, modellen FTW

Yes I am Dutch, modelling FTW

EDIT: I don’t actually “try” modelling… I have some skills already lol; I just wanted to get something in RuneScape before actually making something nice

Read full topic

item.title: My first model in RuneScape, please rate :) - Noob sword
item.dc:creator: @Assassins_Creed_Fan Assassins Creed Fan
item.description:
@Assassins_Creed_Fan wrote:

Wow, nog een nederlander die 3d modelling wil uitproberen, veel succes

Wow, another netherlander who wants to try out 3d modelling, allot of succes wished

About the model itself, as it is your first model I still think that it lacks inmagination nor detail.
This doesn’t even have the looks of a sword, more like a plastic dildo with a handle on it.
Make it less plastic-like, try to make it have a sharper look, and not like a balloon.

Read full topic
